items.title: Offline Shop System
items.description: I developed a complete offline shop system for Metin2, allowing players to sell items even when they are not online. This system includes secure transactions, a persistent database, and an intuitive user interface for managing items and prices.

items.title: Dynamic Quest Framework
items.description: I designed a modular framework for creating quests in Lua and Python. This allowed developers to quickly create new missions with dynamic events, complex dialogues, and custom rewards, significantly improving the gaming experience.

items.title: Advanced Database Management
items.description: I optimized and managed the game database (MySQL/MariaDB) to ensure maximum efficiency and stability. This included designing tables for player data, inventory, and system logs, as well as implementing backup and restore procedures.
